about.title: Welcome to IAGES
about.description: The Indian Association of Gastrointestinal Endosurgeons (IAGES) is an organization of surgeons formed to promote and spread the advancement of Endoscopic Surgery throughout India and beyond. The advancement and improvements in technology has resulted in significant changes in the surgical treatment of patients.

userMessage.name: Dr. T. E. Udwadia
userMessage.description: The Indian Association of Gastrointestinal Endosurgeons (IAGES) is an organization of surgeons formed to promote and spread the advancement of Endoscopic Surgery throughout India and beyond. The advancement and improvements in technology has resulted in significant changes in the surgical treatment of patients.
userMessage.title: FOUNDER OF IAGES

userMessage.name: Dr. Subhash Aggarwal
userMessage.description:
Dear friends,
 I extend warm greetings on behalf of IAGES.

 It is an honour to lead this esteemed organization, founded by pioneers like Dr Tehemton Erach Udwadia, aiming to promote Minimal Access Surgery (MAS).

 Our theme for 2024-25 is "Together We Can," emphasizing collaboration. We aspire to extend MAS benefits nationwide without compromising quality.

 I am proud of our team of skilled laparoscopic and endoscopic surgeons, ready to share their knowledge and train others worldwide.

 IAGES offers a "Travelling Fellowship" Grant of Rs 100,000 for a six-week training period to ten members annually.

 The application form is available on our website iages.in.
 Thanks to the dedication of past presidents, office bearers, and executive members, IAGES is now the world's largest organization of laparoscopic and endoscopic surgeons.

 We continue to pioneer academic courses like FIAGES for basic MAS training and advanced courses in various fields of surgery and endoscopy.

 This year we are going to start. "Team training" program.

 Stay updated on our upcoming events and awards at iages.in

 Long live lAGES
 Yours always,
 Dr. Subhash Aggarwal
 President IAGES 2024-25
userMessage.title: PRESIDENT'S MESSAGE

userMessage.name: Dr. T. Sivakumar
userMessage.description:
Dear Esteemed IAGES Member,
 Warm greetings from IAGES! 

 I am immensely delighted to wish each one of you, those who have re-energized with new feathers to your crown and those who have been working to mark your significant achievement in the IAGES.
I am Dr. Sivakumar, and I am honored to be part of this big family of IAGES as a Honorary Secretary.

 We have been part of this association for such a long time and marching towards a common goal with the collectively produced ideas and action plans. I am certain that we would work "together to take IAGES to next level".

 I reiterate focusing on "knowledge sharing" is absolutely essential in the present scenario because we have witnessed numerous changes in varied fields- technology, trade and commerce, industry, medical tourism and in fact unraveled symptoms of common diseases. Therefore, medical fraternity needs to strive endlessly to strengthen the training programs, develop skill beyond technology and opportunities to equip the upcoming medical graduates where they can fulfill their vision for the future.

 I earnestly encourage all friends and colleagues to become part of IAGES, actively engaging in the diverse fellowship programs. I solemnly assure to upcoming postgraduates that IAGES is a place where your whole life will be an extraordinary.

 Together, let's "Teach and learn the latest, Learn and teach the newest".

 Make IAGES Great!
 Best Regards,
 Dr. T. Sivakumar
 Honorary Secretary, IAGES
userMessage.title: SECRETARYS MESSAGE
